Description: Foot, stem and floor sherd of probably Attic black-glazed pottery cup; trumpet shaped low foot with broad standing surface; glazed black on interior and lower part of foot; edge of foot and broad resting surface reserved with degenerate ivy wreath and dots in black glaze; narrow cone, glazed black on lowest part.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1580)
